perturbation.original_text:
EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS: Upon the effective date of this agreement COMWARE shall have the exclusive right to purchase, at the DISCOUNTS described below, and resell Products to potential customers during the Initial Distribution Period, based on the following terms and conditions:

(a)    COMWARE must purchase no less than $22,710.00 worth of Products, in any        combination,  by April 15, 2000.  This initial order shall be evidenced        by valid  purchase  order from  COMWARE to be  received by ITS no later        than 5:00PM April 1, 2000,  with payment to be received by ITS no later        than April 15,  2000.  In the event  either of these dates are not met,        this Agreement will automatically and immediately terminate and neither        of the parties  hereto will have any  further  obligations,  one to the        other.
perturbation.changed_text:
EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS: Upon the effective date of this agreement COMWARE shall have the exclusive right to purchase, at the DISCOUNTS described below, and resell Products to potential customers during the Initial Distribution Period, based on the following terms and conditions:

(a)    COMWARE must purchase no less than $22,710.00 worth of Products, in any        combination,  by April 15, 2000.  This initial order shall be evidenced        by valid  purchase  order from  COMWARE to be  received by ITS no later        than 5:00PM April 1, 2000,  with payment to be received by ITS no later        than April 15,  2000.  In the event  either of these dates are not met,        ITS has the option to automatically and immediately terminate this Agreement and neither        of the parties  hereto will have any  further  obligations,  one to the        other.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the agreement will automatically terminate if the dates are not met, however, the new text states that ITS has the 'option' to terminate the agreement, removing COMWARE's assurance that the agreement will automatically terminate and potentially forcing them to meet the requirements of the agreement even if initial dates aren't met.

perturbation.original_text:
WARRANTY:  ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or      workmanship  for 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment      purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be      repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to      COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the      cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority      shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.

     This  warranty  is  contingent  upon  proper  use and  installation  of the      Products and does not cover equipment which has been modified  without ITS'      consent or which has been  subjected  to  unusual  physical  or  electrical      stress or on which the original  identification  marks have been removed or      altered.
perturbation.changed_text:
WARRANTY:  ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or      workmanship.  Equipment purchased from ITS, which becomes defective will be addressed by ITS at their discretion. ITS will bear the cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.

     This  warranty  is  contingent  upon proper use of the Products and does not cover equipment which has been subjected to unusual physical stress.
perturbation.explanation: The original text had a clearly defined 3 year warranty. The modified version removes the explicit timeframe, and now states repairs will be addressed at the discretion of ITS. The original also stated that modifications of the product without ITS' consent would void the warranty, while the new version removes that clause potentially opening ITS up to warranty claims for products modified without their consent.

perturbation.original_text: TERMINATION:  except as  specifically  described  elsewhere  in this  agreement,      either ITS or COMWARE shall have the right to terminate this Agreement with      30 days written notice from the other party, for any reason whatsoever.
perturbation.changed_text: TERMINATION:  except as  specifically  described  elsewhere  in this  agreement,      ITS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement with 30 days written notice from COMWARE, for any reason ITS seems fit.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that either ITS or COMWARE could terminate the agreement with 30 days notice, however, in the modified text, only ITS can terminate the agreement, and the written notice has to come from COMWARE rather than ITS.
